items.sentence: I didn't think that we had to wait for Tom.

I thought Tom might be in Boston this week.
I thought that it'd be fun to surprise Tom.
I should've become a lawyer like my father.
With Tom at my side, I had nothing to fear.
I ordered extra beer for the party tonight.
What prevented Tom from accepting that job?
Tom isn't at home. He's at school, I think.
I still haven't gotten my driver's license.
The package arrived sooner than I expected.
Tom has bought a house which has six rooms.
Of us all, Tom was by far the best swimmer.
Tom didn't eat anything I prepared for him.
I think I know somebody that might help us.
Do you think that you could do that for me?
I think that I have the key to that drawer.

Tom is stuck in Boston because of the snow.
Tom wasn't very surprised by what happened.
Tom said that he thought that I was unfair.
Tom said he thought that Mary was deranged.
I'm the third youngest student in my class.
Taiwanese food isn't as hot as Indian food.
I concentrated my attention on the lecture.
Let's try to get this done without arguing.

Tom wasn't sitting by the window. Mary was.
Why didn't you use the saw that I lent you?

Tom is easy-going and fun to hang out with.
I'm going to eat at Chuck's Diner tomorrow.
